summary:
{
  "summary": "",
  "business_intent": ... etc..
We have no standalone functions. So we just output summary about module? The file defines class Match only. So summary about module: provides a class for regex match results. Business intent: to enable pattern matching in Arkouda environment. Keywords similar.

Let's produce JSON.assistantfinal{
  "summary": "Defines a lightweight object that represents the outcome of a regular‑expression search, exposing the matched text, its start and end positions, and any captured groups.",
  "business_intent": "Provides Arkouda users with a convenient way to inspect and extract information from pattern‑matching operations, supporting downstream analytics that rely on substring extraction and positional data.",
  "keywords": [
    "regex",
    "match object",
    "captured groups",
    "start position",
    "end position",
    "substring extraction",
    "pattern search",
    "text analysis"
  ]
}
